data.title: Mamkai, Maṃkāi, Maṅkāi, Mankai, Maṅkai: 3 definitions
data.meta_description: Maṅkai (மங்கை) refers to one of the twelve Āḻvār saints of Tamil Nadu (India), according to the Āṟāyirappati-Kuruparamparāprapāvam (pp. 8-101).
